title: Wadi As-Sirhan, Saudi Arabia
description: Tapping into fossil ground water, Saudi Arabia has been steadily developing agricultural fields using center pivot irrigation. A remarkable example is in the Wadi As-Sirhan Basin in northwest Saudi Arabia.
theme:
FALSE – COLOR. Satellites show what human
eyes can't see
